data.title: Bitcoin sell-off: The correlation between crypto assets & equities
data.description: As bitcoin's (BTC-USD) slump extends into December's first trading session, the crypto asset's sell-off is dragging crypto-exposed stocks lower with it. Clear Street Managing Director and Senior Analyst Owen Lau explains the correlation between cryptocurrencies and related crypto equities amid persistent volatility. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
